name: Gun Switch
description:
My entry for GMTK game jam. Theme: out of control.

A game where you can't control when you can shoot. There is indeed a timer that tells when you next switch will come but unfortunately, it has a nice chance to switch without even giving you time to react. Good luck in fighting a horde of harmless enemies turning into machineguns in a blink of an eye.

  • The top timer indicates who can shoot and when the next switch will be, but has a chance to switch at any time.
  • The red areas indicate where the enemies will spawn.
  • The upper countdown shows the number of enemies left to kill required to advance to the next stage.
  • Go up to advance stage.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Mouse to aim and left click to shoot

Music used:

"Arcade In Action" by Twisty Ceives https://soundcloud.com/twisty-ceives/...
